definitions: the sending and processing of messages by email, text, app, and similar electronic means

examples.text: unsolicited messaging isn't always a cheap form of advertising
the software package incorporates messaging, scheduling, and workflow functions

shortDefinitions: sending and processing of email and texts

definitions: the way in which points are conveyed by a politician, advertising campaign, etc.

examples.text: the debate is as much about political messaging as it is about policy
we think positive messaging is better than negative

shortDefinitions: way in which points are conveyed
